com.mthree.repository

Interface SMRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<OrdersDetails,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<OrdersDetails,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<OrdersDetails,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<OrdersDetails>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<OrdersDetails,java.lang.Integer>

    @Repository
public interface SMRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<OrdersDetails,java.lang.Integer>
    It is a Repository that contains different Queries.

      • getFeeInfo

        @Query(value="select e.feeLader from Exchanges e join e.obd o on e.exchangeId=o.exchangeId where o.traderName=:tn")
